heading: HR00933
0: A RESOLUTION LOOKING INTO THE NEED FOR COUNTRIES TO INCREASE INVESTMENT IN WATER AND SANITATION TO MEET THE TARGETS UNDER THE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS (SDG) AS UNDERSCORED BY THE WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION (WHO) IN ITS NEW REPORT PUBLISHED ON BEHALF OF UNITED NATIONS (UN)-WATER AS IT WARNED THAT ALMOST TWO BILLION PEOPLE CURRENTLY CONSUME CONTAMINATED WATER
status: Pending with the Committee on SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS since 2017-05-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00933
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION LOOKING INTO THE NEED FOR COUNTRIES TO INCREASE INVESTMENT IN WATER AND SANITATION TO MEET THE TARGETS UNDER THE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS (SDG) AS UNDERSCORED BY THE WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION (WHO) IN ITS NEW REPORT PUBLISHED ON BEHALF OF UNITED NATIONS (UN)-WATER AS IT WARNED THAT ALMOST TWO BILLION PEOPLE CURRENTLY CONSUME CONTAMINATED WATER
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2017-04-20
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (094 2017-05-24)2. Dalipe (000 2017-10-03)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS ON 2017-05-03
